traits.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
entries: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.
